Text: RE La Rosita Plant and North Baja PipelineJeff I just called you regarding the tariff to transport gas from California border to MexicoBaja Below is a more detailed request from the LNG project developer Please email me what you find out Have a good weekend Ming Forwarded by Mingcheng LianAPEnron on PM From Kurt nronXgate on AM To Michael McGarryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT George nronXgate cc Mingcheng nron Subject RE La Rosita Plant and North Baja Pipeline GeorgeMing While you are investigating the pipelines also see if you can find out the tariff that Sempra charges to transport gas from the California border to MexicoBaja We are in discussions with Sempra regarding possible joint activities so your investigation should be cautious I dont want to disturb Sempra but I would like to find out how the transportation works transport rate fuel charge etc Kurt Original Message From McGarry Michael Sent Friday May AM To Thomas George Cc Lian Mingcheng Lindahl Kurt Subject Re La Rosita Plant and North Baja Pipeline George Thanks for the concise and informative summary The cost data and schedule information is of particular interest to me Would you continue your investigation concerning the following I would like to know what the existing pipeline distribution system looks like in that area Can we get a map of the pipelines and power plants down the west coast of Baja What are the intentions of the competition in that area What are the major requirements to do work in the area both onshore and offshore Let me know what you guys can dig up Of course confidentiality at this stage is of paramount importance Best regards Mike From George nronXgate on AM To Michael McGarryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Mingcheng nron Subject La Rosita Plant and North Baja Pipeline File La Rosita Plant and North Baja Pipelinedoc Mike We have put together a one page summary of the North Baja Pipeline and the La Rosita plant Let us know of any changes or additions that should be made to the summary or if there is another angle you would like us to approach this from Also if there are any other projects or topics you would like us to analyze please dont hesitate to contact us George Thomas EGM Fundamentals Analyst
Sempra mapcan we also get a sempra gas pipeline distribution map from you thanks a lot Ming

RE La Rosita Plant and North Baja PipelineThank you so much for all the info and the map you provided I went to the website of both Socal and SDGE to get the tariff However I dont really understand how they can be worked out into one If you can provide insights on that or get the tariff numbers to me I will be very much appreciated Above all you are the expert Thanks again Ming From Jeff Dasovich on PM Sent by Jeff Dasovich To Mingcheng nron cc Subject RE La Rosita Plant and North Baja Pipeline To get from the California border down to Mexico you would get service off of SoCalGas and SDGEs tariff ie you have to wheel through SoCalGas and SDGE to get there There may be a single tariff for that service however rather than taking service off of two tariffs Ill try to get the tariff numbers and get back to you All the tariffs are on Sempras website Best Jeff

RE Sempra mapOur developer wants a map shows Sempras Mexican pipeline Can we get it from you Sorry for so many requests thanks Ming Forwarded by Mingcheng LianAPEnron on PM From Kurt nronXgate on PM To Mingcheng nron Michael McGarryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc George nronXgate Courtney nronXgate Subject RE Sempra map Ming Thanks for the map What we really need is a map that shows Sempras Mexican pipeline Kurt Original Message From Lian Mingcheng Sent Wednesday May AM To McGarry Michael Lindahl Kurt Cc Thomas George Campbell Courtney Subject Re Sempra map Mike I got this Sempra map from our SF office Hope it is useful to you cheers Ming Forwarded by Mingcheng LianAPEnron on AM From Jeff Dasovich on PM Sent by Jeff Dasovich To Mingcheng nron cc Subject Re Sempra map OLE Object StdOleLink Heres a map lddDOC File lddDOC Best Jeff
